va-veteran-readiness-and-employment.head: Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E)
va-veteran-readiness-and-employment.summ: If you're a service member or veteran and have a disability that limits your ability to work or prevents you from working, you may be able to get employment support or services to help you live as independently as possible.
va-veteran-readiness-and-employment.elig: discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
